primary.context: Caller wants to sell their property outright
primary.detail: The caller requested a representative to sell their timeshare; the AI attempted a transfer but the queue timed out after 25 minutes, leading the caller to hang up.

steps: AI attempted to collect intent and name before transferring.
Caller stated they wanted to sell their timeshare ownership entirely.
AI attempted transfer to concierge department.
Caller waited in queue for approximately 25 minutes.
Queue timed out and AI re-engaged stating no agents were available.

impediment.detail: The caller was held in a transfer queue for over 25 minutes before being told no representatives were available.

agent_issue.detail: Agent entered a repetitive loop (Turns 13-19) asking the caller to clarify their intent to sell despite the caller already stating they wanted to sell the ownership entirely in Turn 12.

clarifications.note: Asking if caller wants to sell outright

corrections.note: Caller denies AI's phrasing of selling outright

loops.subject: selling vs renting
loops.note: Agent repeatedly asks for clarification on selling

actions.detail: Transfer to concierge timed out after long wait

insights.summary: The caller wanted to sell their timeshare and requested a representative. After a 25-minute wait in the queue, the system informed them no one was available, and the caller abandoned the call in frustration.
insights.verbatim: There are no representatives available to take your call right now, so waiting will not connect you with someone.
insights.coaching: The agent should have proceeded to transfer immediately after Turn 12 when the caller clearly stated they wanted to sell the ownership entirely, rather than looping on clarification questions.
